title: Fullscript | NEXT HEALTH
description: Access our Fullscript platform for convenient online ordering of high-quality supplements. Enhance your wellness journey with trusted products. Sign up today.
cleaned_text: Services Next Health has partnered with FullScript: an online dispensing platform that ships high-quality supplements to your front door. This collaborative effort allows easy access to physician-formulated supplements that help fill in the nutritional gaps in your diet. Our medical team curates your personalized recommendation plan and selects the supplements that best support your micronutrient needs. From there, all you have to do is click the recommended protocol in your email. We take care of the rest: Our supplement protocols have been curated by our medical team to promote optimizing your health in a variety of ways. You can view and shop these protocols below or create an account.
